description: The DSC segment is used in the continuation protocol.

fields.name: Continuation Pointer
fields.description: see description of Continuation Fields in Section 2.8.4.  In an initial query, this field is null.  If the responder returns a value of null or not present, then there is no more data to fulfill any future continuation requests.  For use with continuations of unsolicited messages, see sections 2.7.2 and 2.9.2.  Note that continuation protocols work with both display and record-oriented messages
